@thatguv, I got the same problem but solved it by going into the redist folder & installing the vcredist_x86 it will install OpenMP & a few other things, should fix your problem.
why is this one half the size of the others?
In game it stuttering like shit,but in menu just fine..how to fix this?

@ziffel323

It's a re-pack... ergo the entire game was installed, dismantled and repacked so that the things that can be compressed aren't mixed in with things that aren't or were already compressed and this allows those that are compressible to be, and this shrinks the overall size compared to the original rip. As the original way games are prepared, they don't care for compression as they have 4.7/8.9 or however many GB's on how ever many discs they choose to launch it with. Re-packs serve the purpose of torrents and providing smaller downloads so it's faster and uses less bandwidth.
